ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of the firm of accountants PRICEWATERHOUSECOOPERS LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, to audit the affairs and to perform the annual audits of the Bank of Canada for the five fiscal years commencing on January 1, 2016 and terminating on December 31, 2020.
